author: Michael Hardy
title: You Can See the Coronavirus From Space
description: Satellite images show empty cities, pop-up mega-hospitals, and other signs of the pandemic's spread.
content: Can you see the novel coronavirus from space? You can, as it happensif you know where to look. Since January, the Colorado-based space technology company Maxar has been taking low Earth orbit satellite photographs of Covid-19 hotspots in places like China, It… [+2857 chars]
